r.d: This is the Querysim MDB2 driver.
r.n:
- added debug() call at the end of a query/prepare/execute calling (Request #7933) - added context array parameter to debug() and make use of it whereever sensible - added optional method name parameter to raiseError() and use whereever possible - added debug() call at the end of a query/prepare/execute calling (Request #7933)
open todo items: - add ability to reference multiple results set files for different queries
